transArray.content:
The technology is full, the details are in place, the design is humanized, the room is small but not crowded, and the space is well utilized. The location is good, very convenient, and the surrounding facilities are good. Extra points for bathroom facilities, extra points for decoration quality, extra points for laundry room and gym. I will stay here next time on a business trip.
